divs: sighting detailsat around 8:30pm saturday october 20th 2012,driving east on laraway rd. about a mile west of wolf rd, heading to a friends house in mokena i noticed 4 bright orange lights apparantely hovering in the distance. i could see one of them dim down and approach another one, then it disappeared. then another one disappeared. by the time i got to wolf rd i was directly underneath the area and parked at a walgreens parking lot and exited my vehicle. i saw the last one hover for about a minute then dim down to almost invisible but still could see something fuzzy\faint white moving off towards the east (tinley). when i first noticed the objects i instantly was brought back in my mind to a similar occurence about 4 years ago in wilmington il, same time of year about a week before halloween. i was driving back home from getting a haircut on west river road heading towards custer park and saw several lights over the braidwood area. there were approximately 7 objects behaving similarly, glowing bright then dim down and move, then hover and get bright again. they appeared big and bright like a jumbo jets lights, but orange in color(singularly). i initially found it very odd that aircraft would be this close together in the sky(dangerous to eachother) so i pulled over to get a look. i heard no sound on either occasion. i do not believe they were conventional aircraft, stars, planets, meteors, light reflections, flares,balloons etc. im no expert but im guessing they were too high to be regular remote operated hobby aircraft. i didnt notice any fast movement. it was exciting to see something so strange, yet keeping a skeptical opinion.
Summary: 4 fireball-like objects hovering, moved towards eachother, dimmed light to very faint then moved off
